chapters.title: Introduction to Multiplication
chapters.summary: Basic concepts of multiplication, including understanding and applying the multiplication operation.

pages.title: What is Multiplication?
pages.body: Multiplication is a mathematical operation that represents repeated addition...

pages.title: Multiplication as Repeated Addition
pages.body: Learn how to view multiplication as adding the same number several times...

pages.title: Multiplication Tables (1-5)
pages.body: Master the multiplication tables from 1 to 5 with exercises and practice...

pages.title: Multiplication Tables (6-10)
pages.body: Continue learning multiplication tables from 6 to 10...

pages.title: Commutative Property
pages.body: Understand that in multiplication, the order of numbers doesn't change the result...

pages.title: Associative Property
pages.body: Learn how grouping numbers differently in multiplication doesn't change the product...

pages.title: Distributive Property
pages.body: Explore how to distribute multiplication over addition...

chapters.title: Advanced Multiplication Techniques
chapters.summary: Explore techniques to multiply larger numbers and solve multiplication problems more efficiently.

pages.title: Two-Digit Multiplication
pages.body: Learn how to multiply two-digit numbers step-by-step...

pages.title: Three-Digit Multiplication
pages.body: Advance to multiplying three-digit numbers with examples and practice...

pages.title: Solving Multiplication Word Problems
pages.body: Apply multiplication to solve real-world problems presented in word form...

pages.title: Strategies for Word Problems
pages.body: Learn strategies to break down and solve word problems involving multiplication...

pages.title: Estimating Products
pages.body: Learn how to estimate the results of multiplication to check your work...

pages.title: Mental Math Strategies
pages.body: Develop strategies for multiplying numbers quickly in your head...

chapters.title: Division as Inverse of Multiplication
chapters.summary: Understand division and its relationship with multiplication.

pages.title: What is Division?
pages.body: Division is the operation of splitting a total into equal parts...

pages.title: Division and Multiplication Relationship
pages.body: Understand how division is the inverse operation of multiplication...

pages.title: Division Tables
pages.body: Learn and practice division tables similar to multiplication tables...

pages.title: Division with Remainders
pages.body: Understand how to handle division when the numbers don't divide evenly...

pages.title: Step-by-Step Long Division
pages.body: Learn how to perform long division with larger numbers...

pages.title: Long Division with Remainders
pages.body: Practice long division problems that result in remainders...

chapters.title: Introduction to Fractions
chapters.summary: Learn the basics of fractions, including multiplication and division of fractions.

pages.title: What are Fractions?
pages.body: Fractions represent parts of a whole and are written as one number over another...

pages.title: Equivalent Fractions
pages.body: Learn how to find and work with fractions that have different numerators and denominators but represent the same value...

pages.title: How to Multiply Fractions
pages.body: Learn the steps to multiply fractions, including simplifying the result...

pages.title: Multiplication with Mixed Numbers
pages.body: Explore how to multiply mixed numbers (whole numbers and fractions combined)...

pages.title: How to Divide Fractions
pages.body: Learn how to divide fractions by multiplying by the reciprocal...

pages.title: Division with Mixed Numbers
pages.body: Understand how to divide mixed numbers, including converting them into improper fractions...

chapters.title: Decimals and Percents
chapters.summary: Introduction to decimals and percents, including their relationship with fractions.

pages.title: What are Decimals?
pages.body: Decimals are another way to represent fractions, specifically those with denominators that are powers of 10...

pages.title: Converting Fractions to Decimals
pages.body: Learn how to convert fractions into decimals by dividing the numerator by the denominator...

pages.title: Multiplying Decimals
pages.body: Explore how to multiply numbers with decimal points...

pages.title: Dividing Decimals
pages.body: Learn the process of dividing decimals, including adjusting the decimal point...

pages.title: What are Percents?
pages.body: Percents are a way of expressing a number as a fraction of 100...

pages.title: Converting Between Percents, Fractions, and Decimals
pages.body: Understand how to convert numbers between percents, fractions, and decimals...

chapters.title: Introduction to Geometry
chapters.summary: Explore basic geometric concepts that will lead into algebraic thinking.

pages.title: Identifying Shapes
pages.body: Learn to identify basic geometric shapes such as circles, squares, triangles, and rectangles...

pages.title: Properties of Shapes
pages.body: Explore the properties of these shapes, such as the number of sides and angles...

pages.title: Calculating Perimeter
pages.body: Learn how to calculate the perimeter of various shapes...

pages.title: Calculating Area
pages.body: Understand how to calculate the area of simple geometric figures...

pages.title: What is Volume?
pages.body: Volume measures how much space an object takes up. Learn the basics of calculating volume for cubes and rectangular prisms...

pages.title: Volume of Irregular Shapes
pages.body: Explore how to approximate the volume of more complex shapes...
